languages.text: Однако плоть Судии стянулась туже, облепила Домин, ибо сильны были заблуждения породившей его тени. Тогда Вени'Заккари испустил колдовской крик, и разрушены были преграды. Ибо иногда лишь насилие может положить конец сомнению. Он — есть Смерть.

But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.
languages.original_text: Однако плоть Судии стянулась туже, облепила Домин, ибо сильны были заблуждения породившей его тени. Тогда Вени'Заккари испустил колдовской крик, и разрушены были преграды. Ибо иногда лишь насилие может положить конец сомнению. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: However, the Judge's flesh wrapped tighter around the Enim, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Oa'Weisz let out a magical cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. Ayen Kaen Dho.

However, the Judge's flesh wrapped tighter around the Enim, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Oa'Weisz let out a magical cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Enim, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Oa'Weisz let out a magical cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Enim, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Oa'Weisz let out a magical cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. Ayen Kaen Dho.

But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

languages.text: Doch das Fleisch des Richters wickelte sich nur noch enger um {mf|den|die} Domin, denn stark waren die Wahnvorstellungen des Schattens, der ihn hervorgebracht hatte. Dann stieß Veni'Zacchary einen magischen Schrei aus und brachte die Hindernisse zum Einsturz. Denn es gibt Zeiten, in denen nur Gewalt Zweifeln ein Ende setzen kann. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Doch das Fleisch des Richters wickelte sich nur noch enger um {mf|den|die} Domin, denn stark waren die Wahnvorstellungen des Schattens, der ihn hervorgebracht hatte. Dann stieß Veni'Zacchary einen magischen Schrei aus und brachte die Hindernisse zum Einsturz. Denn es gibt Zeiten, in denen nur Gewalt Zweifeln ein Ende setzen kann. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Pero la carne del Juez solo se enredó con más fuerza en torno a{mf|l| la} Domin, pues los delirios de la sombra que lo había engendrado eran poderosos. Entonces, Veni'Zacchary soltó un grito embrujado y abatió los obstáculos. Pues, en ocasiones, solo la violencia puede despejar las dudas. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Pero la carne del Juez solo se enredó con más fuerza en torno a{mf|l| la} Domin, pues los delirios de la sombra que lo había engendrado eran poderosos. Entonces, Veni'Zacchary soltó un grito embrujado y abatió los obstáculos. Pues, en ocasiones, solo la violencia puede despejar las dudas. Él es la muerte.

languages.text: しかし、ジャッジの肉体はドミンに強く絡みつくばかりだった。それを産み落とした影の妄想が強かったためだ。その後、ヴェニ・ザカリーは魔術的な叫びをあげ、障害物を破壊した。暴力の身が疑念に終止符を打つことができるためである。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: しかし、ジャッジの肉体はドミンに強く絡みつくばかりだった。それを産み落とした影の妄想が強かったためだ。その後、ヴェニ・ザカリーは魔術的な叫びをあげ、障害物を破壊した。暴力の身が疑念に終止符を打つことができるためである。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 然而，仲裁者的血肉却在秘者身上缠绕得更紧了，因为孕育了这只怪物的阴影是如此癫狂。这个时候，帷者扎卡里发出了充满巫术力量的吼声，摧毁了所有障碍。有的时候，只有暴力才能终结怀疑。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 然而，仲裁者的血肉却在秘者身上缠绕得更紧了，因为孕育了这只怪物的阴影是如此癫狂。这个时候，帷者扎卡里发出了充满巫术力量的吼声，摧毁了所有障碍。有的时候，只有暴力才能终结怀疑。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: Mais la chair du Juge se resserra autour {mf|du|de la} Domin, car les illusions de l'ombre qui l'avait {mf|engendré|engendrée} étaient bien trop fortes. Veni'Zacchary poussa alors un cri occulte qui abattit tous les obstacles. Car il est des moments où seule la violence peut mettre fin au doute. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Mais la chair du Juge se resserra autour {mf|du|de la} Domin, car les illusions de l'ombre qui l'avait {mf|engendré|engendrée} étaient bien trop fortes. Veni'Zacchary poussa alors un cri occulte qui abattit tous les obstacles. Car il est des moments où seule la violence peut mettre fin au doute. Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Fakat Yargıç'ın eti, yalnızca Domin'in etrafını sıkıca örmüştü. Çünkü onu doğuran gölgenin hezeyanları kuvvetliydi. Ardından Veni'Zacchary, sihirli bir çığlık kopararak engelleri yere serdi. Çünkü kuşkuya bazen yalnızca şiddet son verebilir. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: But the Judge's flesh only twined tighter around the Domin, for strong were the delusions of the shadow that had spawned him. Then Veni'Zacchary let out a sorcerous cry, and brought down the obstacles. For there are times when only violence can put an end to doubt. He is Death.
